name: Jill Blimp Mini-game
description:
Warning: Body expansion fetish content ahead. Character depicted is over the age of 18. Only download/play if you're over 18.

Hello! Here's a body inflation mini-game featuring artwork by BexiBlimps of Jill Stingray from Va-11 Hall-A. Check out their art here: https://www.deviantart.com/bexiblimps

In this game, you can click Jill's body to shake her up for expansive results. A strange chemical appears at the sides of the screen; bring it to her mouth to refuel the reaction.

Controls:
R to restart
Optional popping on warning screen - toggle the button based on preference. If popping is disabled, the game ends when the chemical stops appearing.
Left click on Jill's body to bounce it and trigger gradual inflation
Left mouse to drag the chemical (holding down left mouse makes grabbing it easier)
Drag the chemical to Jill's mouth to have her drink it and increase the expansion caused by clicking her (if this isn't done, clicking her will eventually have no effect).

I'll probably update this at some point and/or add an HTML version, it's pretty short. Regardless, I hope you enjoy if you're into this stuff.
